articles.title: Facebook faces ‘devastating’ EU-to-US data transfer ban - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The social media giant failed to block a bid that could ban it from sending data about its European users to the US.
articles.content: Irelands data regulator can resume a probe that may trigger a ban on Facebooks transatlantic data transfers, the High Court ruled on Friday, raising the prospect of a stoppage that the company warns … [+2882 chars]
